title: Central Excise (Amendment) Act, 2025 Receives Presidential Assent!
content:
# Central Excise (Amendment) Act, 2025 Receives Presidential Assent!

Ek important update hai. Government ne Central Excise (Amendment) Act, 2025 ke liye Presidential assent announce kiya hai.

*   The President of India has given assent to the Central Excise (Amendment) Act, 2025.
*   This Act was officially notified on December 11, 2025.
*   The primary purpose of this amendment is to revise the excise duty structure on tobacco and tobacco products. It aims to replace the outgoing GST compensation cess on these items with a permanent central excise duty, ensuring the overall tax incidence remains stable.
*   This legislation is officially identified as Act No. 34 of 2025.
*   The Act specifically amends the Fourth Schedule, Section IV of the Central Excise Act, 1944, introducing updated tariff rates for various tobacco and nicotine-related products.
